hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Abdullah bin Mawhab said:“I heard Tamim Ad- Dari say: ‘I said: O Messenger of Allah, what is the Sunnah concerning a man from among the People of the Book who becomes a Muslim at the hands of another man?’ He said: ‘He is the closest of all people to him in life and in death.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب الرَّجُلِ يُسْلِمُ عَلَى يَدَىِ الرَّجُلِ
chapter.eng-name: A man who becomes Muslim at the hands of another
